wikipedia_page.main: Martin William Pike (12 July 1920 – 10 January 1997) was a British athlete who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born in Tendring, Essex. He was part of the winning British 4×400 metres relay team at the 1950 European Athletics Championships.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1948 Summer Olympics

response: * Martin Pike (Australian footballer) (born 1972), Australian rules footballer
